profile.name: Name

teachingStyles.superEncouragingDesc: Always positive, celebrates every small progress
teachingStyles.superEncouragingFeedback: Fantastic! You're doing great! Every mistake is a step towards success!
teachingStyles.encouragingDesc: Supportive and patient, focus on the positive

teachingStyles.strictFeedback: Wrong. You skipped a fundamental step. Go back and redo it.
teachingStyles.brutalFeedback: No. Completely wrong. You need to study more, this isn't working.

adaptiveModes.balancedDesc: Adapts pace and difficulty while maintaining stability
